channel.title: How do i get rune defender and is getting skillcapes possible..?

item.title: How do i get rune defender and is getting skillcapes possible..?
item.dc:creator: @rob1601 rob1601
item.description:
@rob1601 wrote:

You need to understand that skillcapes can only be put into the server with a newer cache in the client. This takes a lot of time

Read full topic

item.title: How do i get rune defender and is getting skillcapes possible..?
item.dc:creator: @carpcatcher carpcatcher
item.description:
@carpcatcher wrote:

this is what i got told to do…

this is the code for public static int shields on my items.java file

public static int shields[] = {6631,6633,6889,7336,7332,7334,1171,1173,1175,1177,1179,1181,1183,1185,1187,1189,1191,1193,1195,1197,1199,1201,1213,1540,2589,2597,2603,2611,2621,2629,2659,2667,2675,2890,3122,3488,3758,3839,3840,3841,3842,3843,3844,4072,4156,4224,4225,4226,4227,4228,4229,4230,4231,4232,4233,4234,4302,4507,4512,6215,6217,6219,6221,6223,6225,6227,6229,6231,6233,6235,6237,6239,6241,6243,6245,6247,6249,6251,6253,6255,6257,6259,6261,6263,6265,6267,6269,6271,6273,6275,6277,6279,6524};

i put the rune daggers id in red…did i put it in the right place?

if i can, how would i get skillcapes on my server?
